summary: The PlayStation, or PS1, was a popular video game console made by Sony. It came out in the 1990s and competed with the Nintendo 64 and Sega Saturn. Sony made it after a failed project with Nintendo. The PlayStation was known for its 3D graphics and many popular games like *Gran Turismo* and *Crash Bandicoot*. It was affordable and had a cool marketing campaign. Over 4,000 games were made for it, and it sold really well, helping Sony become a big name in video games. It even led to newer PlayStation consoles later on.
title: PlayStation (console)
